ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: NOT(ISPICKVAL(Brand__c, '839')) && NOT(ISPICKVAL(Brand__c, '836')) && NOT(ISPICKVAL(Brand__c, '860')) && NOT(ISPICKVAL(Brand__c, '873')) && NOT(ISPICKVAL(Brand__c, '871')) && NOT(ISPICKVAL(Brand__c, '872')) && NOT(ISPICKVAL(Brand__c, '837')) && NOT(ISPICKVAL(Brand__c, '864')) && NOT(ISPICKVAL(Brand__c, '870')) && NOT(ISPICKVAL(Brand__c, '833')) && NOT(ISPICKVAL(Brand__c, '861')) && NOT(ISPICKVAL(Brand__c, '838')) && NOT(ISPICKVAL(Brand__c, '824')) && NOT(ISPICKVAL(Brand__c, '829')) && NOT(ISPICKVAL(Brand__c, '884')) && NOT(ISPICKVAL(Brand__c, '885')) && NOT(ISPICKVAL(Brand__c, '844')) && NOT(ISPICKVAL(Brand__c, '834')) && NOT(ISPICKVAL(Brand__c, '874')) && NOT(ISPICKVAL(Brand__c, '830')) && NOT(ISBLANK(TEXT(Brand__c))) && ( percentage_of_turnover__c = FALSE && countermark__c = FALSE && Prepaid__c = FALSE && Quantity_Declarative__c = FALSE)
ValidationRule.errorMessage: At least one of the royalties must be selected
